channel.title: Commands! please answer!
channel.description:
Hey guys! I figured out how to do commands! But one problem... each time i teleport/::item it messages in chat box this
you cant teleport in combat - i deleted the text and left it but now it does the same thing with no words, help?
also, how do you add pictures.... :S

item.title: Commands! please answer!
item.dc:creator: @Sunarpe Sunarpe
item.description:
@Sunarpe wrote:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“barrows”) && !inCombat) { triggerTele(3565, 3311, 0); } else { sM("");}
if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“thieve”) && !inCombat) { triggerTele(2662, 3305, 0); } else { sM("");}

Read full topic

item.title: Commands! please answer!
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

Sunarpe:

the only commands that i have made are ::barrows and ::thieve?

Post them

Lol, and that doesn’t mean typing ::barrows and ::thieve

It means going into your source file and pasting the code for the codes here.

Read full topic

item.title: Commands! please answer!
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

[quote=“Sunarpe, post:5, topic:371888”]Ohk, Example - I teleport to Barrows.

The message will say…
You have teleported to barrows (then under it)
You have teleported to thieve (a different command i made)

help?[/quote]

So does it teleport you as well as display the messages? or just display the messages and not teleport you?

And post both those commands.

Read full topic

item.title: Commands! please answer!
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

[quote=“Sunarpe, post:3, topic:371888”]if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“thieve”) && !inCombat) { triggerTele(3565, 3311, 0); } else { sM(“You can’t teleport in combat!”);}

i deleted ‘You can’t teleport in combat!’ and left it as

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“thieve”) && !inCombat) { triggerTele(3565, 3311, 0); } else { sM("");}

now each time i punch in a command like ::bank/::item/::tele
it says “nothing” at all.[/quote]

Does it teleport you as well as display the message or just display the message and not teleport you?

Read full topic
